ygData.msgSnippet: Rockseeker landed on top of the mountain. He transformed to his sturdy looking robot mode and looked around. The air was clear and fresh. This was a virgin

X-Yahoo-Profile: warriorazure

Rockseeker landed on top of the mountain. He transformed to his 
sturdy looking robot mode and looked around. The air was clear and 
fresh. This was a virgin planet, untouched by the ravages of 
civilization... yet. The Cybertronians posed a great threat to that. 
It had to be dealt with.

That would be Lunekill's job. For now, he wanted to examine the 
Energon's quality. He lifted his fist in the air and took his 
momentum. He punched through the rocks and straight into a deposit. 
Then, he grasped a big chunk of crystaline energon and took it out. 
Appraising it like a jewel-crafter looking at a finely cut diamond, 
he lifted it to his mouth and engulfed it whole.

The reaction was instantaneous and astonishing. It coursed through 
him as a power surge, making him feel like a powerhouse. Oh, did he 
love this sensation of power! It was the first time he had ever 
experienced something as strong as this! It did not stop here, 
though, as he would have expected. The surge built in him until he 
could no longer hold it back, then, with a crackling of static 
electricity, he literally blew the top of the mountain off. He could 
no longer control his power surge! His feelings were amplified 
tenfolds. He was enraged!

No use for Lunekill, the Cybertronians would have to die now!

He flew away and, sensing a group of Predacons, stopped. He lifted a 
double pulse gun and fired, again and again.

Rockseeker: Die, you oversized crawlers!
